targets.rawSql:
SELECT count(*)
FROM calls c
WHERE c.crashed=0 AND c.answered_at IS NULL AND
      c.hangup_cause IS NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number)) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number))));

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
  AVG(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(answered_at, start))) as "time in seconds"
FROM calls as c
WHERE (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number)) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number))))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT count(*)
FROM calls c
WHERE c.crashed=0 AND c.answered_at IS NOT NULL AND 
      c.end IS NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number)) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number))));

SELECT start as "time", caller_number as "caller", callee_number as "callee"
FROM calls c
WHERE c.crashed=0 AND c.answered_at IS NOT NULL AND 
      c.end IS NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number)) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number))));

SELECT
  0 as time,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "answered"
FROM calls as c
WHERE $__timeFilter(start) AND direction="out" AND answered_at IS NOT NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.caller_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.caller_number)));

SELECT
  0 as time,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "unanswered"
FROM calls as c
WHERE $__timeFilter(start) AND direction="out" AND answered_at IS NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.caller_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.caller_number)));

SELECT
  0 as time,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "answered"
FROM calls as c
WHERE $__timeFilter(start) AND direction="in" AND answered_at IS NOT NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.callee_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.callee_number)));

SELECT
  0 as time,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "unanswered"
FROM calls as c
WHERE $__timeFilter(start) AND direction="in" AND answered_at IS NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.callee_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.callee_number)));

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
count(*) as "total"
FROM calls as c
WHERE (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number)) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number))))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "incoming"
FROM calls as c
WHERE direction='in'
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.callee_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.callee_number)))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "outgoing"
FROM calls as c
WHERE direction='out'
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.caller_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.caller_number)))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "answered"
FROM calls as c
WHERE direction='out' AND answered_at IS NOT NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.caller_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.caller_number)))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "declined"
FROM calls as c
WHERE direction='out' AND answered_at IS NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.caller_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.caller_number)))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(answered_at, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
  AVG(TIME_TO_SEC(TIMEDIFF(end, answered_at))) as "time in seconds"
FROM calls as c
WHERE $__timeFilter(start) AND answered_at IS NOT NULL
AND not voicemail
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number)) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number))))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "answered"
FROM calls as c
WHERE direction='in' AND answered_at IS NOT NULL
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.callee_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.callee_number)))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
  count(DISTINCT call_id) as "declined"
FROM calls as c
WHERE direction='in' AND answered_at IS NULL 
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.callee_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.callee_number)))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroup(start, '$time_unit', 0) as time_sec,
count(*) as "total"
FROM calls as c
WHERE voicemail
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number)) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number))))
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  caller_number as "Caller",
  callee_number as "Callee",
  TIMEDIFF(end, answered_at) as Duration
FROM calls as c
WHERE $__timeFilter(start)
AND answered_at IS NOT NULL
AND end IS NOT NULL
AND direction = "in"
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number)) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE (number=c.caller_number or number=c.callee_number))))
ORDER BY Duration DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
  caller_number as Number,
  TIMEDIFF(answered_at, start) as Duration
FROM calls as c
WHERE $__timeFilter(start)
AND answered_at IS NOT NULL
AND direction = "in"
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.callee_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.callee_number)))
ORDER BY Duration DESC
LIMIT 5

SELECT
  caller_number as Number,
  count(*) as Count
FROM calls as c
WHERE $__timeFilter(start)
AND direction = "in"
AND (c.group_extension in (SELECT extension from groups WHERE '${groups:pipe}' REGEXP alias) or ('${groups:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" AND c.group_extension IS NULL))
AND (EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers join teams on teams.id = team_id and '${teams:pipe}' REGEXP teams.name WHERE number=c.callee_number) or
('${teams:pipe}' REGEXP "Other" and NOT EXISTS (SELECT number from teams_numbers WHERE number=c.callee_number)))
group by caller_number
ORDER BY count desc
LIMIT 5

SELECT start AS "time", callee_number AS "number of callee", caller_number AS "number of caller"
FROM calls
WHERE crashed=1
ORDER BY start DESC
LIMIT 10

list.definition: SELECT alias FROM groups ORDER BY field(alias, 'Other') ASC, alias;
list.label: Groups
list.name: groups
list.query: SELECT alias FROM groups ORDER BY field(alias, 'Other') ASC, alias;

list.definition: SELECT name FROM teams ORDER BY field(name, 'Other') ASC, name;
list.label: Teams
list.name: teams
list.query: SELECT name FROM teams ORDER BY field(name, 'Other') ASC, name;
